effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, growing a Wild Mushroom at a nearby enemy's location at 100% effectiveness. Casting Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune always hits a Jackpot!.
Set: Starfall and Starsurge damage against targets affected by your Wild Mushroom's damage over time effect is increased by 20%.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

Equip: When damaged below 30% health, gain a shield for 8 sec which absorbs up to 1.8 million damage.

This effect can only be triggered once every 4 min but is reduced by 12 sec per unique Algari gem color socketed.
Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 12% and your Stamina by 10% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 6,683 primary stat for 20 sec.
